Useful Information about the ALTA 2024 Shared Task

This page contains some links that participants may find useful when attempting the task. More information may be added later on.

  • Transformer-based models for text classification. [Hugging Face]
  • Detecting AI-Generated Sentences in Human-AI Collaborative Hybrid Texts: Challenges, Strategies, and Insights. [Arxiv]
  • Towards Automatic Boundary Detection for Human-AI Collaborative Hybrid Essay in Education. [Arxiv]
  • SeqXGPT: Sentence-level AI-generated text detection. [Arxiv]
  • Segformer: a topic segmentation model with controllable range of attention. [AAAI]
  • Transformer over pre-trained transformer for neural text segmentation with enhanced topic coherence. [ACL Anthology]
